special_text:
[+1]: Mpumo deals 1 damage to each opponent. Create a 1/1 white and black Rebel creature token.
[-3]: Target player sacrifices a nonland permanent with the greatest mana value among permanents that player controls.
[-7]: Exile the top seven cards of your library. Whenever a creature you control attacks this turn, you may cast one of those cards without paying its mana cost.
